org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent
Class HarvestAgentSOAPClient

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent.HarvestAgentSOAPClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
HarvestAgent, HarvestAgentConfig
public class HarvestAgentSOAPClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements HarvestAgent, HarvestAgentConfig

An implementation of the HarvestAgent Interface using SOAP to communicate with the HarvestAgent

Author:
nwaight
